name: Dragon's Howl
description:
Play as Harold, the eager but exhausted adventurer who just wants to hush the dragon and get a good night's sleep!  He's kept up all night by the roaring beast. And during the day the dark magic in those roars may even blind Harold!

Harold has made up his mind he will slay the beast, but a mysterious old man blocks the path and has strange demands of our hero.

Use the Light Shards to free people's bound souls from the Shade to full fill the old man's demands. But be warned, you can not use the shards when blind.

Can Harold get a good nights rest? Or will the shade put him to sleep permanently before he can slay the dragon?
